TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: I’m at the shuttle! I’m ready to make my first pilgrimage to the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>.
BELLS: That’s exciting! You’re almost ready, but there’s still one more rule you need to learn. Come see me at the Tower of Quantum Knowledge.
BELLS: The tower is on the opposite side of <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>. If you follow the path west to the <color=orange>Crossroads</color>, you can reach the tower from there.
SOLANUM: My gratitude for the directions, Bells. I’ll see you soon!
